title: OCE Clash Community - Find a team, players and scrims

embed.description: Step up your game with a modern voice & text chat app. Crystal clear voice, multiple server and channel support, mobile apps, and more. Get your free server now!

body:
Howdy,

For those looking to get involved in Clash, I have created a discord channel for the OCE community.

The aim of the channel is to be able to find a team, find players for your team and find teams to scrim with. Beyond that aim, it's a great place to meet like-minded players.

It also provides dedicated team channels for you and your new team to voice chat.

Feel free to join: https://discord.gg/jHUjmRR

The more the merrier.

Update: 70 players have joined so far and the server is growing steadily, teams are forming and players are looking. Clash launches on the 25th!
